name: Connection (Chapter 1)
description:
A catastrophic doomsday.
An underground city hundreds of millions of years in the future.
A family split apart and distant.
-
I've converted the first chapter of the cyberpunk double murder mystery novel that I'm currently writing into an interactive PowerPoint. This chapter is a short introduction to the world-building and backstory.

Created for the PowerPoint game jam. Their theme was sci-fi, so making this seemed perfect!

Content Warning: There's some writing about unpleasant medical/skin stuff.

Nearly all sound effects and music from zapsplat.com

Update 7/19/20: Some of the fonts were not embedded in the original chapter so that's been fixed!
